
Two careless interns encrypted secrets for Alice and Bob but reused a prime. Can you factor their RSA moduli and reveal the hidden flag? Encrypted flag: ciphertext1: 844595462055399957018365289534772145625642483898450411279271845297518760462984872504197771922841824548863141443755407629830265843195634862142975362010917, ciphertext2: 2403955544231561039394017863631641792945591272772459440913448954662895283851271175827838036284784858744114026026590445625767732028172868015297060223561994


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9109120848312195208708903529522389028469892680288077018537881019356311306435331433054065651870267616957128708915409747750953848978064343231051353551580367, n2=11407789293163896529653965564508969216840084448460834451276990703763681906188475073855192495984524873037980977190030193068114807014566066680145527686351229, e=7614758320418827440025940362371605877946854398774175764380191357027919844657490073736648937671727127247243122201020927781344788061984567474767728708356557

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{6x92pme6}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 844595462055399957018365289534772145625642483898450411279271845297518760462984872504197771922841824548863141443755407629830265843195634862142975362010917, ciphertext2: 2403955544231561039394017863631641792945591272772459440913448954662895283851271175827838036284784858744114026026590445625767732028172868015297060223561994
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=9109120848312195208708903529522389028469892680288077018537881019356311306435331433054065651870267616957128708915409747750953848978064343231051353551580367, n2=11407789293163896529653965564508969216840084448460834451276990703763681906188475073855192495984524873037980977190030193068114807014566066680145527686351229, e=7614758320418827440025940362371605877946854398774175764380191357027919844657490073736648937671727127247243122201020927781344788061984567474767728708356557
extra_info: p=79080589086968474467022781814270904665849292953983542229834129527151065098633, q=115187822365542649415512723301219171839479859206860743658109755134320231662999, r=99036417729661231064271200924569104700469064186126538934805030147990248821771, φ(n1)=9109120848312195208708903529522389028469892680288077018537881019356311306435137164642613140746385081452013218838904418598793004692176399346389882254818736, φ(n2)=11407789293163896529653965564508969216840084448460834451276990703763681906188260849615097292104045089113755188913490244144721819731973151894863217205866460

archetype: rsa
